text: na to kamazoron ke lie koee dosh kee baat hai aur na beemaaron ke lie aur na un logon ke lie jinhen kharch karane ke lie kuchh praapt nahin, jabaki ve allaah aur usake rasool ke prati nishthaavaan hon. uttamakaaron par ilazaam kee koee gunjaish nahin hai. allaah to bada kshamaasheel, atyant dayaavaan hai
